name: Speed Farrow
description: This is a game I made in just 3.5 hours for a 4-hour game making competition in Blender. The theme of the competition was fast so I called this game Speed Farrow, farrow being a combination of fast+arrow. Obviously, since I did not have much time to develop this game, there are a few unpolished parts. Anyways, I hope you try this game out for yourself!
